title: Airwheel good quality Electric self balance skateboard
text: Airwheel good quality Electric self balance skateboard , 25 September 2015 -- Riding safety is actually maximized by the optimized and humanized design of Airwheel electric self-balancing scooterCompared with traditional electric scooters, Airwheel electric scooter provides more riding safety due to its optimized and humanized design with protection mechanism, which plays a crucial role in advancing riding experience with Airwheel self-balancing scooter. First and foremost, Airwheel electric scooter is designed with limit speed, and Airwheel electric scooter will react to potentially dangerous speed automatically. For instance, the pedal of Airwheel single-wheeled electric self-balancing scooter will be raised and reminds riders of the dangers caused by large-speed riding. In fact, Airwheel riders are prevented from potential dangers from large-speed riding. Moreover, Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter will provide real-time data report for riders, which will inform riders of temperature, speed, as well as miles, and Airwheel riders can better react to different situations during the riding. Thatâ€™s why traditional electric scooters are incomparable to Airwheel electric scooter in aspect of safety. Airwheel electric scooter is outstanding in design details that reflects humanism. After all, riding safely is first and foremost to a wonderful riding experience, and Airwheel electric scooter has optimized protection mechanism for maximized riding safety for riders. For instance, the handles of Airwheel two-wheeled electric scooter are covered by silica gel that protects riders from discomforts caused by riding on bumpy and rutty roads. Besides, the anti-skidding pedals prevent riders from slipping. Moreover, all types of Airwheel self-balancing scooters are designed according to ergonomic engineering to ensure the riding comforts so that riders will not get physically exhausted or discomforts from long-time ridings. Besides, the tail lights of Airwheel electric scooter is specially designed to ensure the safety of riding at night. The light of tail lights makes the relatively small-sized Airwheel electric scooter easy to be identified on roads. The new release Airwheel A3 self-balancing scooter is designed with an electronic braking system that can automatically react to emergency brakes within 2 seconds, reducing the dangers from sharp brakes. Besides, Airwheel A3 electric self-balancing scooter is also equipped with hydraulic suspension that will reduce the discomforts caused by bumps from riding on rutty roads.
